contactUs.title: Contact us
contactUs.description: Get in touch with our team for feature request, questions, complaints or thank-you notes!

about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to our platform, a project born from necessity and passion!
about.desc1: Welcome to our platform, a project born from necessity and passion. When we were preparing for our hunting and firearm license exams, we found ourselves navigating a sea of outdated information, fragmented resources, and platforms that either no longer existed or were stuck in the past. The lack of a reliable, modern solution inspired us to take matters into our own hands.
about.desc2: We created this website to simplify the journey for anyone preparing for these exams. Our goal is to offer an accessible, user-friendly platform where you can find everything you need in one place — from practice exams to up-to-date information tailored to the current requirements
about.desc3: By offering these resources for free, we aim to ensure that no one else has to face the same frustrations we did. Whether you’re just starting out or refining your knowledge, we’re here to support you every step of the way.
about.desc4: Thank you for trusting us to be part of your journey. Let’s make your preparation process as smooth and successful as possible!
